file_content.text: We won't give up the fight for Corellia. May the Force be with you.
All I ever wanted was to fight the Empire. Now that I'm here, all I want is peace.
I know I shouldn't say this, but I wish we had some Flesh Raiders to throw at the Empire's forces.
I wish Master Orgus could see me. I think he'd be proud I finally returned to the Jedi.
Who would've believed, when we dueled on Tython, that I'd be fighting at your side one day. Life is strange.
These Mandalorian mercenaries worked for the Empire. They were hunting me. I....
I'm sorry, this is difficult. Seeing you, surrounded by dead men... reminds me of things I'd rather forget.
What happened on Tython was a lifetime ago. We're different people now.
Let go of your past, Bengel.
Sometimes it feels that way. Right now, it could be yesterday.
I'm sorry, I don't know what you're talking about. Have we met?
Do we know each other?
Have I changed that much? It's me, Bengel Morr. You brought me to justice on Tython, when you were still a Padawan.
After what you did on Tython, I'm surprised the Council let you come here.
How did you get to Corellia?
There are so few of us left to fight. My training isn't complete, but Master Kaedan decided I was ready.
I arrived with three Masters the Council assigned to me. They're dead. We're being slaughtered here.
The Council appointed me supreme commander of the Jedi on Corellia. We have reinforcements gathering nearby. Go to these coordinates.
Supreme commander? It will be an honor to serve you.
Do you ever wonder if I prepared you for this? Perhaps the Force guided me to attack you on Tython.
If it was the Force, it wasn't the light side guiding you.
That was the dark side.
You're right. I shouldn't think about such things.
Destiny always looks clearer in hindsight.
It's possible.
I want to believe all the pain I caused wasn't for nothing.
There's no justification for what you did. Stop pretending like you have a destiny.
Have you lost your mind?
It wasn't my intention to anger you. Please forgive me.
I'll go to the coordinates and wait for your orders.
When I heard about the fighting on Corellia, I knew they'd send you. And now my patience is rewarded.
Look at you. You're everything I ever hoped you'd become, Weapon of the Jedi.
Whoa. Creepy guy alert.
You don't know the half of it, Doc.
That's putting it mildly.
Ignorance is bliss.
You know this person?
Someone I haven't seen for a very long time.
That's a long story.
Has he always smelled like that?
And what is this broken creature?
A pathetic thing that owes me its life. I'm still waiting for my payment.
A parasite with a debt to pay.
A Jedi who exacts debts? Interesting.
Stand back. Identify yourself.
Give us a reason not to kill you.
You heard him, Bengel.
I'm your comrade, here to fulfill my vow.
Nautolan organic = familiar // T7 databanks = returning no matches
If he isn't in your memory banks, you must not know him.
[Lie] You never met him.
T7 databanks = incomplete // Memory corruption = troubling
Leave him to me. What do you want, Bengel?
I'll handle this.
If he tries anything, cut him down.
Be ready to attack.
Why would I ever harm the fulfillment of my destiny?
I've traveled the galaxy seeking knowledge and weapons for you. I've brought everything here.
These things will help you in the battles ahead. Use them to destroy the Sith forever.
You kept your bargain. You're free to go.
Thank you, I will.
I promised you more than just these gifts.
My final duty is to spread terror among your enemies. Be the thunder that heralds your storm. They will fear your name.
Farewell, Weapon of the Jedi. May you bathe in our enemies' blood....
Setting you free was a mistake. You're sick. You've done horrible things.
Right after I arrest you.
I'm turning you over to the authorities for your own good. Drop your weapons and surrender.
No... no! You sound like them! They've weakened you with their lies!
We agreed, the weak must be destroyed. If you won't do it, I will!
You've served your purpose. You can die now.
Starting with you. [Kill him]
But... there's so much more I could do for you....
What the blaze was that for?
We're not getting off to a great start here.
You murdered a willing slave. Wasteful.
Was there a tactical advantage to this, Master Jedi?
Jedi = killed strange man // T7 = unable to calculate motive
The man was insane. He would've attacked us the moment we turned our backs.
He was dangerous.
I don't have time to explain, but trust me--it was the right thing to do.
Just forget about it.
I'm supreme commander of the Jedi. I'll do what I want, when I want.
Don't question my decisions.
This is gonna be one of those days. I can already tell.
Lead on, then. We've wasted enough time here.
Understood, Master Jedi. Ready to move out when you are.
Key to stopping Emperor = saving lives // Jedi = remember this?
Are you even a Jedi, anymore?
We must never give up. The people of Corellia are counting on us.
The Force is with us!
Surrender is your only hope!
This is for Coruscant!
The dark side won't save you!
We're here to stop this madness!
Your reign of terror is over!
You can't run from the light!
The Empire will fall!
